        public E language(String lang)
        Sets the to-be-built tag data element's language to the provided language value. It is expected that the language code conforms with ISO 639 language codes and ISO 3166â€‘1 country codes.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language value
        Returns:
        the same builder instance
        See Also:
        RFC5646
